channel.title: Dissonance on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Dissonance on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: The Same Name Game
item.description: Hey guys, Ernie here with a piece from Andrew Egan, who may have just invented a new kind of movie review with this piece. If you’re looking for a soundtrack for this issue, I recommend this one. Today in Tedium: The content explosion has had some strange side effects. Binge watching is altering our brains and decreasing production costs have nurtured YouTubers’ desire for mainstream success. But as Amazon, Netflix, and Hollywood in general prepare to spend billions on original content in the coming years, an even stranger phenomenon is happening in plain sight.
